Trade/Device Name(s): ARIES C. difficile Assay Complete Kit
ARIES C. difficile Assay Protocol File Kit
ARIES C. difficile Assay Kit (24 cassettes)
Regulation Name(s): Clostridium difficile toxin gene amplification assay
Specimen Container(s): Stool resuspension tube with preprocessing beads and Stool Resuspension Buffer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Luminex ARIES C. difficile Assay, a qualitative real-time PCR assay for detection of toxigenic Clostridium difficile genes in stool samples.
Indications for Use Summary: A qualitative real-time PCR in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of toxigenic Clostridium difficile nucleic acid in unpreserved, unformed stool from patients suspected of C. difficile infection, used as an aid in diagnosis.
